_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Cobalt.tools
author: support@example.com
description: Cobalt is a versatile API and web interface for downloading content from various platforms.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Cobalt Installation Script

apt update
apt install -y git curl

cd /mnt/server

git clone https://github.com/imputnet/cobalt.git .

curl -fsSL https://get.pnpm.io/install.sh | sh -
source /root/.bashrc

cd api/src
pnpm install

echo "Installation completed successfully."

variables.name: API Port
variables.description: The port on which the API server will listen

variables.name: API URL
variables.description: The URL from which the API server is accessible

variables.name: API Name
variables.description: The name of the API server shown in /api/serverInfo

variables.name: CORS Wildcard
variables.description: Toggle cross-origin resource sharing (0: disabled, 1: enabled)

variables.name: Rate Limit Window
variables.description: Rate limit time window in seconds

variables.name: Duration Limit
variables.description: Max allowed video duration in seconds

variables.name: Tunnel Lifespan
variables.description: Duration for which tunnel info is stored in RAM, in seconds
